disp-quote.p: You see some of us are very old and we do not have the energy to use the technique, but we believe that it is productive. As such, we are using our own gantshompo (CA) where we dig very small holes and do not even put manure. These holes capture water and as such we do get a better harvest although the technique we are using is not the gantshompo (CA) that most people use. (Female, communal farmer, in her 80s)
